text: The Blue Room is the third EP released by English band Coldplay. It is their first release after signing with the Parlophone label in April 1999. == Track listing == # "Bigger Stronger" – 4:49 # "Don't Panic" – 2:38 # "See You Soon" – 2:51 # "High Speed" – 4:16 # "Such a Rush" – 4:57 Category:Coldplay Category:1999 albums
title: The Blue Room (EP)
